h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location
h3_title: Horse Guai The New West Location
content: As you progress through the temple, you will eventually meet two mages with a large door behind them. Before heading ahead, take the path along the balcony on the left, to a walkway with a large statue. The Horse Guai is standing by one of these pillars on the walkway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Dark_Thunder.md', within the main section titled 'Dark Thunder', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Dark Thunder Location' and the sub-subsection 'Horse Guai The New West Location'.
The content is as follows:
As you progress through the temple, you will eventually meet two mages with a large door behind them. Before heading ahead, take the path along the balcony on the left, to a walkway with a large statue. The Horse Guai is standing by one of these pillars on the walkway.
